name: SARSTestsForSARS_CoVAntibody
title: SARS (Tests for SARS_CoV Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of SARS coronavirus antibody.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: component: SARS coronavirus Ab),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
